string-array.name: game_descriptions
string-array.item: Kingdom Hearts is a series of action role-playing games developed and published by Square Enix in collaboration with Disney.
Kingdom Hearts II is a sequel 2005 action role-playing game developed and published by Square Enix for the PlayStation 2 video game console.
Animal Crossing is a life simulation video game developed by Nintendo EAD and published by Nintendo.
Super Mario Sunshine is a 2002 3D platform game developed and published by Nintendo for the GameCube
Final Fantasy VII is a 1997 role-playing video game developed by Square for the PlayStation console.
Horizon Zero Dawn is a 2017 action role-playing game developed by Guerrilla Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.
Final Fantasy XV is a 2016 action role-playing game developed and published by Square Enix as part of the Final Fantasy series.
Overwatch is a 2015 team-based multiplayer first-person shooter developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment.
Destiny is an online-only multiplayer first-person shooter video game developed by Bungie and previously published by Activision
Super Smash Bros. Melee is the second crossover fighting video game developed by HAL Laboratory and published by Nintendo for the GameCube in 2001.
